channel.title: Rune.Evolution 742 (Re-Opening) - 24/7
channel.description:
[size=x-large]RUNE.EVOLUTION 742[/size] Hosted 24/7 on a 4GB RAM VPS
Website: [url=http://rune-evo.co.uk/]http://rune-evo.co.uk/[/url] Highscores: [url=http://rune-evo.co.uk/highscores.php]http://rune-evo.co.uk/highscores.php[/url] Webclient: [url=http://rune-evo.co.uk/webclient.php]http://rune-evo.co.uk/webclient.php[/url]
Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Rune.Evolution! At R.E we offer you several new and exciting ways to enhance your gameplay experience! With our excellant economy and persistent content updates, you'll surely never be bored! Come join Rune.Evolution today and begin your adventure into something great and challenging!
We're hosted around the clock 24/7 on our massive 300MB/s VPS with 4GB of RAM so there is sure to be NO LAG and NO DOWNTIME. We respect each and every one of our players regardless of their status and listen to every suggestion or complaint to optimize the gameplay for everybody! We even have an oline store fully integrated with the server to gain that extra advantage over other players!
Our uniquely designed website will provide the most ease of use than most others including features like Highscores, Vote 4 Cash, Donations, an Item Database, Chat Rooms, and so much More! No forum registration is required to play! Just launch the desktop client or the web client, and get right on in the action! Below is a breakdown of just some of the features that we have to offer you!
[ul][li] Over 30 Achievements with Rewards![/li] [li]Forum Steam Integrated / Registration and Login[/li] [li]Online Store to buy items! Fully integrated with the server![/li] [li]Over 10 Challenging Bosses to fight![/li] [li]Unique Highscores to compare and compete against friends![/li] [li]Great Starter Kit for New Players[/li] [li]Challenging Skill Experience, not too rough tho[/li] [li]Vote4Cash to earn 500k just by voting![/li] [li]Automated Donate for Cash! 3m for every dollar![/li] [li]Tons of MiniGames such as Fight Caves, and the Kiln[/li] [li]Plus much more![/li][/ul] As stated before, we're currently in development and a few things must be added and changed. We need players to tell us ideas so we can improve upon the server every day. Im the only developer but i can work pretty fast and get most things done. Been running a RSPS since 2006 and still going at it today.
UPDATES June 14, 2013
[ul][li]- Discontinued the 637 Project, started up the 742[/li] [li]- Implemented over 30 Achievements[/li] [li]- Adjusted the Experience Rates to be more challening[/li] [li]- SQL Loaded Spawns, Items Prices, and other things[/li] [li]- Fixed RuneSpan so you can buy Essense[/li] [li]- Updated the Client so sprites for donators are correct[/li][/ul]
ScreenShots

[size=x-large]RUNE.EVOLUTION 742[/size]
Hosted 24/7 on a 4GB RAM VPS

Website: http://rune-evo.co.uk/
Highscores: http://rune-evo.co.uk/highscores.php
Webclient: http://rune-evo.co.uk/webclient.php

Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Rune.Evolution! At R.E we offer you several new and exciting ways to enhance your gameplay experience! With our excellant economy and persistent content updates, you’ll surely never be bored! Come join Rune.Evolution today and begin your adventure into something great and challenging!

We’re hosted around the clock 24/7 on our massive 300MB/s VPS with 4GB of RAM so there is sure to be NO LAG and NO DOWNTIME. We respect each and every one of our players regardless of their status and listen to every suggestion or complaint to optimize the gameplay for everybody! We even have an oline store fully integrated with the server to gain that extra advantage over other players!

Our uniquely designed website will provide the most ease of use than most others including features like Highscores, Vote 4 Cash, Donations, an Item Database, Chat Rooms, and so much More! No forum registration is required to play! Just launch the desktop client or the web client, and get right on in the action! Below is a breakdown of just some of the features that we have to offer you!

[ul][li] Over 30 Achievements with Rewards![/li]
[li]Forum Steam Integrated / Registration and Login[/li]
[li]Online Store to buy items! Fully integrated with the server![/li]
[li]Over 10 Challenging Bosses to fight![/li]
[li]Unique Highscores to compare and compete against friends![/li]
[li]Great Starter Kit for New Players[/li]
[li]Challenging Skill Experience, not too rough tho[/li]
[li]Vote4Cash to earn 500k just by voting![/li]
[li]Automated Donate for Cash! 3m for every dollar![/li]
[li]Tons of MiniGames such as Fight Caves, and the Kiln[/li]
[li]Plus much more![/li][/ul]
As stated before, we’re currently in development and a few things must be added and changed. We need players to tell us ideas so we can improve upon the server every day. Im the only developer but i can work pretty fast and get most things done. Been running a RSPS since 2006 and still going at it today.

UPDATES
June 14, 2013

[ul][li]- Discontinued the 637 Project, started up the 742[/li]
[li]- Implemented over 30 Achievements[/li]
[li]- Adjusted the Experience Rates to be more challening[/li]
